More information is provided in the NIDDK health topic, Kidney Stones in Adults.",NIDDK,Medullary Sponge Kidney
How to prevent Medullary Sponge Kidney ?,"Scientists have not yet found a way to prevent medullary sponge kidney. However, health care providers can recommend medications and dietary changes to prevent future UTIs and kidney stones.",NIDDK,Medullary Sponge Kidney
